department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Natural resources Canada (NRCan) has a need for 1 GMC Savana cargo van.
full_summary:
### **GMC Savana Cargo Van Tender Notice**

#### **Introduction**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is seeking bids for the procurement of one (1) GMC Savana Cargo Van.

#### **Solicitation Details**

*   Solicitation number: WS4532754706
*   Solicitation title: GMC Savana Cargo Van
*   Amendment number: 4
*   Publication date: April 23, 2024
*   Tender closing date and time: May 31, 2024 2:00 PM EDT
*   Amendment date: May 27, 2024

#### **Procurement Details**

*   Procurement category: Goods and Services (GD)
*   Procurement method: Competitive - Open bidding
*   Selection criteria: Lowest Price

#### **Delivery Requirements**

*   Deliveries are required to be made to the Department of Natural Resources (NRCan) located in Ottawa and Gatineau

#### **Contract Details**

*   Expected contract start date: June 10, 2024
*   Expected contract end date: March 31, 2026

#### **Notice Type and Trade Agreements**

*   This notice is a Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
*   The purchase is covered under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### **End User Entities**

*   The end user of the GMC Savana Cargo Van will be the Department of Natural Resources (NRCan) in Ottawa and Gatineau

#### **Contact Information**

*   For more information, please contact Valerie Matheson at valerie.matheson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### **Publicly Available Tender Documents**

*   The solicitation documents can be found at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19491017?extsite=MTk0OTEwMTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
